channel.title: Using Photo Shop to make drawing into 3D Styled
channel.description: any one know how i can make a drawn picture and scan it and then color and turn into like 3D image using Photo Shop?

item.title: Using Photo Shop to make drawing into 3D Styled
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

You can draw three pictures in PS as references, top side and bottom. Then use these as references in the 3D program you use. Then build the model yourself. However if you don't know anything about 3D you shouldn't try, as that'd be going in over your head.

Read full topic
item.source: Using Photo Shop to make drawing into 3D Styled

item.title: Using Photo Shop to make drawing into 3D Styled
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

SETO:

any one know how i can make a drawn picture and scan it and then color and turn into like 3D image using Photo Shop?

A 3d image? Im assuming you dont know anything about 3d models.

Go download some programs such as blender, wings3d, etc and find some tuts on 3d modelling. To my knowledge, you cant just generate a "3d picture" from a 2d one, how would it become 3 dimensional? It wouldnt make sense.

Read full topic
